price: 76. Waxayna ku taal (magaaladaasi)18 waddo weli la deggan yahay.
footnotes: 18. Magaalada Sodom ee u dhow badda meytan ee hadda loo yaqaan Al-Baxrul Mutawasid ama Mideterean.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
